name: I can't quack
description:
Once upon a time there was a young duckling that was different from his brothers

He was ugly, weird and most important...

He couldn't quack

I can't quack is (for now) a  made in Unity WIP game submited to the two weeks jam I Can't Write But Want To Tell A Story 

Game design, ilustration and coding

Bruno Costa
Raquel Olhovetchi

Musics
Action RPG Music Free - by VGcomposer
Woodland Music Album - 070718 - by GWriterStudio
